about_the_game:
Composed by Carlos Vallejo, an hour and half-hour album inspired by the classics JRPGs. Produced, mixed and mastered by Krill Audio.

Tracklist:

  • When the wind blows blue - Prologue
  • Remembering the fire
  • Press start
  • You need to train first!
  • What is so funny?
  • Learning the unknown
  • Shinn, city of water
  • Ruined entrance
  • Windy flame - Battle theme
  • Sorry, but I need to win
  • Is this... the end?
  • Ardalia Singer
  • Challenge galleries
  • Smiling in the dark (Divider's theme)
  • Divided by the flame (Divider's battle)
  • Crying for my blades
  • Reflection
  • Shinn's temple
  • Remembering the water
  • The first time I met you...
  • The Downgarden
  • Echoes from the past
  • The shadow is growing...
  • Fated to be a weapon
  • Striking the dark
  • Crystal laboratory
  • Mirrored battle! (Music box)
  • I don't want you to forget her...
  • Shinn's under attack!
  • Berani's fears
  • Wind is blowing blue
  • Let the flame burn it all!
  • The buried vestige
  • We're fighting together!
  • The blaze threads
  • Empty rest
  • The non-promise to return
  • Blue wind through the seasons
  • The oath of the guardian
  • Rain of fire
  • Last defense
  • Fighting the last hope
  • The mistery of the sadaâ
  • Conquering through the flames
  • The last blue wind
  • And for death is her song
  • The sacrifice
  • The Innerworld
  • The Amaranthine
  • Shadow of existence
  • Shadow of existence - Electronic Ver.
  • The eighth door - Prelude and Fugue
  • Eternal sunshine of the forgotten guardian
  • When the wind blows blue (End Credits)
  • BONUS TRACK - Guardian's love
  • BONUS TRACK - When the wind (Reprise)
  • BONUS TRACK - Windrhymes' blue wind

Soloists:

When the wind blows blue - Nuria (Vocal)
When the wind blows blue - Candela Vázquez (English horn)
Divided by the flame - Carlos Casco (Electric guitar)
Quiva’Luin’s theme - The innerworld - Carlos Casco (Electric guitar)

KRILL Audio:
Felipe Milano, Carlos Casco & David García.

name: Noahmund - Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8/8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3 2GHz and above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS250 / Radeon HD5750 or better
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8/8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 2.2GHz and above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX460 / Radeon HD6850 or better

short_description: Composed by Carlos Vallejo, an hour and half-hour album inspired by the classics JRPGs. Produced by Felipe Milano & Carlos Vallejo and mixed by Krill Audio.
